message.entry: YData must be a numeric vector.

The positional grouping variable and sample data must be vectors of the same length, matrices of the same size, or a combination of a vector and a matrix where the length of the vector matches either the number of columns or rows of the matrix.
''EvaluationPoints'' and ''DensityValues'' are not supported if sample data is specified.
XData must be of type numeric or categorical.
XData and YData must be vectors of the same length.
EvaluationPoints and DensityValues must have the same size.
You cannot specify ''GroupByColor'' with table input.
You cannot specify ''GroupByColor'' when you specify ''EvaluationPoints'' and ''DensityValues''.
To specify ''GroupByColor'', specify the positional grouping variable and sample data arguments as vectors.
''GroupByColor'' value must be a vector of the same length as the sample data argument.
When EvaluationPointsMode is ''manual'', the number of groups in XData must match the number of columns in EvaluationPoints.
When EvaluationPointsMode is ''manual'' and DensityValuesMode is ''auto'', both XData and YData must be provided.
When EvaluationPointsMode is ''auto'' and DensityValuesMode is ''manual'', both XData and YData must be provided.
Changing the ''Orientation'' property is not supported when the violin plot has categorical values in multiple y-axes.
Changing the ''Orientation'' property is not supported when the violin plot has categorical values and the axes contains charts of different types.
